summary: Scooby-Doo and the gang find a treasure map in a pizza and set out to find the treasure of Gnarlybeard the Pirate, encountering Gnarlybeard, the Phantom Parrot, a spooky lighthouse keeper, and a suspicious archaeologist along the way.
cast: Frank Welker|Stephanie D'Abruzzo|Grey Griffin|Matthew Lillard|Jeff Bennett|Dee Bradley Baker|John Rhys-Davies|Alice Dinnean|Eric Jacobson|Peter Linz|Paul McGinnis|Adam Rudman|David Rudman|Matt Vogel
title: Scooby-Doo! Adventures: The Mystery Map
